location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Map of Persia the Persian Gulf

mods.abstract: Distinctive Features:Relief shown by hachures and spot heights. A portion of a map showing Persia and the Persian Gulf with provinces outlined and coloured for reference. Shows various routes across the region and the submarine telegraph line to India.Inscriptions:Coordinates and scale statement inserted in black ink; and â€˜Amara' [Amarah, Iraq] added in red ink.
